# [Interview #1041: Spokane Signing Report - theofficetroll, Entry #3](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1041#3)

#### Brandon Sanderson

There are 2 Shards on Roshar, however Honor is dead.

#### Footnote

The two Shards are Honor and Cultivation.
